dmca.title: Re: [ABUSE] DCMA complaint]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, February 03, 2006 10:15 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: Re: [ABUSE] DCMA complaint]

This message was received at abuse@theplanet.com on Friday, February 03,
2006 at
8:13:47 AM and concerns a matter for which responsibility is delegated to
your team. The message and headers follow.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

SUBJECT:
[ABUSE] DCMA complaint]

MESSAGE BODY:
This page remains on the web with my content still on it, what is being done
to remove it?

> http://www.copyscape.com/view.php?o=33755&u=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.xanersoft
> -expert-seo-company.com%2Flink-building.htm&t=1138740665&s=http%3A%2F%
> 2Fwww.alliance-link.com%2Fcustom-link-building.htm&w=18&c

----- Original Message -----
From: "The Planet Policy Enforcement" <abuse@theplanet.com>
To: <copyright@theplanet.com>; <debra@alliance-link.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 31, 2006 3:58 PM
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DCMA complaint]


> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
> Hash: SHA1
>
> Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at
> the address of copyright@theplanet.com.
>
> - -------- Original Message --------
> Subject: [ABUSE] DCMA complaint
> Date: Tue, 31 Jan 2006 15:57:01 -0500
> From: Debra/Alliance-Link <debra@alliance-link.com>
> To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
>
>
>
> This site, which according to the WHOIS, you are hosting, has my copy on
> it page.
>
>
<http://www.copyscape.com/view.php?o=33755&u=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.xanersoft-expe
rt-seo-company.com%2Flink-building.htm&t=1138740665&s=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.allia
nce-link.com%2Fcustom-link-building.htm&w=18&c>=
>
> I've used the copyscape.com tool to show you exactly what has been copied.
>
> Please have it removed immediately.  You can check my site via
> Archive.org to see that this text has been on my site for years.
>
> I appreciate your help, thank you.
>
> Debra Mastaler
> Alliance-Link.com
>
> - --
> Thanks,
>
> Policy Enforcement
> The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
> http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
> Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
> Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org
>
> iD8DBQFD38+IvK/XpJs6oyURAh3BAKCffySL199fcb8NTp4N/ZfCMD6F2gCfdNFc
> osmF8CEM1EmrOUKSO0s6iOw=
> =IiNX
> -----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
>
>
>
